block.p: Betsey Anne Kittenplan, a daughter of Gail and Stephen Kittenplan of New York, was married yesterday to Edward Noel Pick, the son of Karol and Pablo Pick, also of New York. Dr. Arthur Caliandro, a minister of the Reformed Church in America, officiated at the Plaza.

Mrs. Pick, 28, is a reporter for People magazine in New York. She graduated from William Smith College and received a master's degree in journalism from Columbia. Her father is a financial consultant and senior vice president for investments at Salomon Smith Barney in New York. Her mother runs a personal shopping service in New York.

Betsey Anne Kittenplan, a daughter of Gail and Stephen Kittenplan of New York, was married yesterday to Edward Noel Pick, the son of Karol and Pablo Pick, also of New York. Dr. Arthur Caliandro, a minister of the Reformed Church in America, officiated at the Plaza.

Mrs. Pick, 28, is a reporter for People magazine in New York. She graduated from William Smith College and received a master's degree in journalism from Columbia. Her father is a financial consultant and senior vice president for investments at Salomon Smith Barney in New York. Her mother runs a personal shopping service in New York.

Mr. Pick, 31, is a vice president in the equity capital markets group at Morgan Stanley Dean Witter in New York. He graduated magna cum laude from Middlebury College and received an M.B.A. degree from Harvard. His mother is an archivist in the Thomas J. Watson Library of the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York. His father owns the Blue Channel Corporation, a New York investment company.
